message:
NATIONAL MISSING CHILDREN’S DAY - Take time today to talk with children about staying safe and what to do when approached by someone they don’t know.  

Observed annually, National Missing Children’s Day has been commemorated each year on May 25th since 1983, when it was first proclaimed by President Ronald Reagan. 
#missing #children #nationalmissingchildrensday #ncmec
